overview: The Buryat Underground Creative Association (BATO), the Nerpa music association and the Udmurt artist Toma-3000 tell how they started, how their bas-reliefs and images are connected with Buddhist mythology, what social and cultural themes they touch on, how their art helps the city and ordinary residents. And they also talk — each in their own way - about how important it is not to forget where you grew up.
title: Exit Through the Yurt
